data.why:
DBD::MaxDB - a MaxDB Driver for DBI.

    Hi, I'm planning to contribute a DBD driver for the open source
    database MaxDB formerly known as SAP DB. For details about MaxDB see
    http://www.mysql.com/products/maxdb .

    Regards, Marco

    __________________________________ Marco Paskamp SAP AG NWDT MaxDB

    30/41092-373 mailto:marco.paskamp@sap.com
